headline: PepsiCo Strengthens Wellness Brands Portfolio With Poppi Acquisition
summary: PEP's acquisition of Poppi strengthens its position in the fast-emerging functional beverage space, signaling a bold strategic pivot toward health innovation.

headline: PepsiCo: acquires poppi for $1.65bn
summary: PepsiCo has announced that it has acquired poppi for a net price of $1.65bn, including a performance-based price supplement. This acquisition is part of the company's portfolio transformation to meet...
